about_the_game:
(StarBlues)is an equipment-driven third-person shooter produced by Rama Studio, a Shanghai-based indie game team.
Play as a robot wanderer in the game, with no name, no designation, and only one goal stored in memory for an unknown amount of time: to search for the core of the ruins.
Delve into the ever-changing maze of massive constructs, enhance yourself with the equipment and resources you've acquired from the ruins, destroy hordes of out-of-control enemies and bosses, uncover the secrets of the past, and ultimately learn the truth of the events.

Features:

- Use different weapons to target enemy weaknesses to deal with different combat situations.

- A randomly generated combination of maps events and monsters.

- Find and equip a variety of firearms and equipment to create your own gear combinations.

- Dodge and look for opportunities to fight back in a dense attack.

- Face hordes of monsters and tackle them with handy weapons.

short_description: Our mysterious protagonist wanders through the vast alien ruins, constantly searching for the core of the ruins with his robot companion who has lost its memory. Fight hordes of out-of-control enemies to reach the core, and witnessing the secrets buried in the deepest recesses of the ruins.
